# Request for Proposal (RFP) for Design Build Services: Curing Facility Addition to K4 Building

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: HQ000827
* **Reference Number**: MX-43014071465
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Publication Date**: 2024-01-23
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-19, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

## Project Description

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites qualified Design-Build Teams to submit proposals for the design and construction of the Curing Facility Addition to K4 Building at 5CDSB Gagetown, Oromocto, New Brunswick.

## Services Required

The selected proponent will be responsible for providing the following services:

* Design and construction of the Curing Facility Addition
* Project management
* Supervision
* Estimating and cost control
* Quality assurance and control
* Health and safety management
* Security management
* Construction engineering and inspection
* Building Information Modeling (BIM)

## Selection Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the following criteria:

* Technical qualifications and experience of the proponent
* Proposed design and construction methodology
* Project management and scheduling
* Cost control and budgeting
* Quality assurance and control
* Health and safety management
* Security management
* Compliance with relevant laws and regulations

## Conditions of Participation

* The proponent must meet the eligibility criteria specified in the RFP.
* The proponent must submit their proposal in accordance with the format and guidelines specified in the RFP.
* The proponent must provide all necessary documentation and information required by DCC.
* The proponent must demonstrate a thorough understanding of the project requirements and the ability to deliver a high-quality project that meets the needs of DCC.

## Important Dates

* Closing Date for Proposals: 2024-03-19, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* Opening of Proposals: 2024-03-20, 09:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* Evaluation of Proposals: 2024-03-24, 17:00:00 (Eastern Time)
